content: As they say goodbye to Ao Lie, MK, Mei, and Bai Long Ma, Wukong and Macaque express happiness at finally being able to go home to Flower-Fruit Mountain after centuries of imprisonment. Wukong talks about fighting monsters in his old stomping grounds. Macaque talks about drinking tea, feeling the sun on his skin, and breathing the mountain air. Let's write that scene with details and dialogue.
